results.title: Exploring the dual character of metformin in Alzheimer's disease.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ may work through mechanisms involving homeostasis of @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ metabolism, decrease of @<m>DISEASE_Plaque_Amyloid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058225 @@@amyloid plaque deposition@@@, normalization of @GENE_MAPT @GENE_4137 @@@tau@@@ protein phosphorylation and enhancement of autophagy.

results.title: Long-term treatment with rosiglitazone and metformin reduces the extent of, but does not prevent, islet amyloid deposition in mice expressing the gene for human islet amyloid polypeptide.
